get.description: Fetches all distinct batch entries with their latest information.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

schema.description: The page number for pagination (default is 1).
The number of items per page (default is 12).

batchId.description: The unique identifier for the batch.

batchHeaderHash.description: The hash of the batch header.

blobsLength.description: The length of the blobs in the batch.

items.description: The quorum numbers associated with the batch.

blobHeadersRoot.description: The root of the blob headers.

quorumNumber.description: The quorum number for which the stake is signed.

stakeAmount.description: The amount of signed stake for the quorum.

transactionHash.description: The transaction hash associated with the batch.

blockNumber.description: The block number for the batch.

nonSigners.description: The count of non-signers for the batch.

signers.description: The count of signers for the batch.

operators.description: Details about operators in the batch.

stakeAmount.description: The amount of stake for the quorum.

limit.description: The number of items per page.

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the latest update.

get.description: Fetches detailed information about a batch, including metadata, logs, transactions, and block details.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

schema.description: The unique identifier for the batch.

parameters.name: batchHeaderHash
parameters.description: The batch header hash to identify the batch data

schema.description: The unique identifier for the batch.

get.description: Fetches detailed information about a batch, including metadata, logs, transactions, and block details.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

parameters.name: batchHeaderHash
parameters.description: The batch header hash to identify the batch data

get.description: Fetches detailed information about a batch, including metadata, logs, transactions, and block details.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

schema.description: The unique identifier for the batch.

get.description: Fetches all non-signers information of a given batch.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Select the network you want to track.

schema.description: The ID of the batch for which non-signer information is being requested.

operatorId.description: The unique ID of the operator.

operator.description: The name or identifier of the operator.

socket.description: The socket associated with the operator.

ejected.description: Whether the operator has been ejected from the batch.

total.description: The total number of non-signers for the given batch.
